fields.model_text: The 3 Story 2 Wide Model is made from six 40-ft shipping containers integrated with our own elements to maximize its functionality and aesthetic design. This floor plan is ideal for housing two families with full kitchen and living spaces on each above-ground enclosed floor. Our floor plans are customizable to meet your needs. Contact us for more information at info@boltonbloks.com
fields.amenities:
Lift, Spiral staircase,
Dumbwaiter, Rooftop, Wet bar
fields.laundry: Has laundry access from each floor
fields.interior_features:
Balcony, Sliding dual pane
glass doors, Recessed Lighting
